story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Chairman Rose’s speech got everyone talking,
and rumors spread quickly.
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Some people are even publicly criticizing our
young master.
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Seriously, as if Master Lear would ever monopolize
the sync stones!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Pasio’s starting to split into opposing factions—
Lear supporters and Rose supporters!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0600_10:
If we leave it like this, things could get
even worse...
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We need to fight back! We should use the same
method he’s using!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_0900_10: Do you have some sort of plan?
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah! But in order for it to work, I need
everyone’s help!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Chairman Rose has been trying to solve a problem
that’s a thousand years away from affecting us!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1200_10:
It was the same when he caused the Darkest Day.
As long as he’s able to protect the future, he
doesn’t care what people think of him now.
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1300_10:
That’s why, before anything like that can happen,
I want to properly tell him this time that...
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1400_10: we can change the future together—not alone!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I don’t want Chairman Rose to make the same
mistake again!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1700_10: I also want to tell him we should cooperate!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I think that the future Chairman Rose cares about
and the Pasio Lear is aiming to create are
both wonderful!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_2200_10:
We’re about to have some battles, but it’s not to
defeat someone!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_2300_10:
We’re going to battle in order to understand each
other—and to move toward a shared future!
story_galar_01_14000/2401_1001_2400_10: Let’s show Chairman Rose our new future!
